datasheet.name: Devastating Assault
datasheet.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

options.description: This model’s Voidweaver haywire cannon can be replaced with 1 prismatic cannon.

stratagems.name: DECKPLATE SWEEPERS
stratagems.legend: Indiscriminate hails of splinter fire fill chambers and corridors, leaving nowhere to hide in the enclosed space.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One KABAL unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of splinter cannons, splinter rifles and splinter pistols equipped by models in your unit by 1.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One KABAL unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of splinter cannons, splinter rifles and splinter pistols equipped by models in your unit by 1.

stratagems.name: ELUSIVE DUELLISTS
stratagems.legend: These warriors delight in the close-quarters blade-duels of boarding actions, weaving around their enemies' blows and cutting them down in droves.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One DRUKHARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and, if your unit has the INCUBI keyword, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and, if your unit has the INCUBI keyword, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

stratagems.name: OPPORTUNISTIC THIEVES
stratagems.legend: Any undefended source of riches or power is fair game to these fast-moving raiders.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: End of your Fight phase.TARGET: One KABAL unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.EFFECT: Select one objective marker you do not control that is visible to your unit. Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", but if it does, every model in that unit must end that move as close as possible to that objective marker.
stratagems.when: End of your Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One KABAL unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Select one objective marker you do not control that is visible to your unit. Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", but if it does, every model in that unit must end that move as close as possible to that objective marker.

stratagems.name: TAKE THEM ALIVE
stratagems.legend: Aiming to maim rather than slag, and employing psychotropic or paralysing venoms, the Kabalites seek to incapacitate their victims so that they too may be taken as plunder.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase, just after a KABAL unit from your army has shot.TARGET: That KABAL unit.EFFECT: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of your unit’s attacks this phase (excluding those made with Pistols). That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result if your unit is within 6” of it.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase, just after a KABAL unit from your army has shot.
stratagems.target: That KABAL unit.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of your unit’s attacks this phase (excluding those made with Pistols). That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result if your unit is within 6” of it.

stratagems.name: MOULDED MUSCULATURE
stratagems.legend: The muscular fleshcraft monstrosities fielded by the Haemonculi can punch through hatchways and bulkheads to reach their cowering victims.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Select any number of models in your unit. Until the end of the phase, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of melee weapons equipped by the selected models by 1, and each time you select targets for attacks made by those models, they must target an enemy unit that is wholly on the opposite side of a Hatchway from them.
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Select any number of models in your unit. Until the end of the phase, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of melee weapons equipped by the selected models by 1, and each time you select targets for attacks made by those models, they must target an enemy unit that is wholly on the opposite side of a Hatchway from them.

stratagems.name: UNFEELING ABOMINATIONS
stratagems.legend: The creations of the Haemonculi are capable of enduring terrible wounds and continuing to fight.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 if your unit has the GROTESQUES keyword: on a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.RESTRICTIONS: If your unit has the GROTESQUES keyword, until the end of the phase, it loses the Mindless Killing Machines ability.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 if your unit has the GROTESQUES keyword: on a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.RESTRICTIONS: If your unit has the GROTESQUES keyword, until the end of the phase, it loses the Mindless Killing Machines ability.

stratagems.name: TERRIFYING AURA
stratagems.legend: The disturbing nature of these creatures causes weapons to quiver, even in the hands of veteran soldiers.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks and is within 6" of the attacking unit.EFFECT: That enemy unit must take a Leadership test, subtracting 1 if it is within 3" of your unit: if failed, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack that targets your unit, an unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit, irrespective of the attacking weapon’s Ballistic Skill or any modifiers.
stratagems.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks and is within 6" of the attacking unit.
stratagems.effect: That enemy unit must take a Leadership test, subtracting 1 if it is within 3" of your unit: if failed, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack that targets your unit, an unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit, irrespective of the attacking weapon’s Ballistic Skill or any modifiers.

stratagems.name: HORRIFYING FORM
stratagems.legend: The hulking monsters of the Haemonculus Covens are terrifying indeed, cowing enemy warriors with their grotesque and intimidating forms.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: End of any phase, when an objective marker Secured by your army would be Seized by an enemy unit.TARGET: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army within range of that objective marker.EFFECT: Until the end of your next turn, while you have one or more DRUKHARI units within range of that objective marker (excluding Battle-shocked units), that objective marker remains Secured by your army and cannot be Seized by enemy units.RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle round.
stratagems.when: End of any phase, when an objective marker Secured by your army would be Seized by an enemy unit.
stratagems.target: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army within range of that objective marker.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of your next turn, while you have one or more DRUKHARI units within range of that objective marker (excluding Battle-shocked units), that objective marker remains Secured by your army and cannot be Seized by enemy units.RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle round.

stratagems.name: ALLIANCE OF AGONY
stratagems.legend: Even the most bloodthirsty Drukhari will veil their enmity to work together against a shared enemy for the same gruesome purpose.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of any phase.TARGET: One ARCHON, one SUCCUBUS and one HAEMONCULUS from your army.EFFECT: Discard one Pain token from your Pain token pool. Until the end of the phase, all three of those models’ units are Empowered.RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem if you are able to select all three of the target models stated above.
stratagems.when: Start of any phase.
stratagems.target: One ARCHON, one SUCCUBUS and one HAEMONCULUS from your army.
stratagems.effect: Discard one Pain token from your Pain token pool. Until the end of the phase, all three of those models’ units are Empowered.RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem if you are able to select all three of the target models stated above.

stratagems.name: QUICKSILVER REACTIONS
stratagems.legend: The hyper-fast reflexes of the Drukhari allow them to duck and weave to avoid all but the swiftest enemy strikes.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One DRUKHARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack that targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.RESTRICTIONS: You cannot target a HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army for this Stratagem.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack that targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.RESTRICTIONS: You cannot target a HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army for this Stratagem.

stratagems.name: INSENSIBLE TO PAIN
stratagems.legend: The twisted creations of the Haemonculus Covens are insensible to all but the most mortal injuries.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: PREY ON THE WEAK
stratagems.legend: The scent of a foe in pain draws Drukhari to it like hungry predators to an injured beast, their senses sharpening at its tang.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One KABAL unit from your army and one enemy unit that is Below Half-strength.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One KABAL unit from your army and one enemy unit that is Below Half-strength.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: ACROBATIC DISPLAY
stratagems.legend: Many Wych Cults favour spectacular gymnastic displays. Their fighters are never still, springing from one foot to the other at blinding speed.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Charge phase.TARGET: One WYCH CULT unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge even if it Fell Back or Advanced this turn.
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One WYCH CULT unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge even if it Fell Back or Advanced this turn.

stratagems.name: STRIKE AND FADE
stratagems.legend: The Drukhari are masters at using hit-and-run tactics, engaging a target with a flurry of shots before quickly manoeuvring into cover or out of sight.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: End of your Shooting phase.TARGET: One DRUKHARI unit from your army (excluding AIRCRAFT).EFFECT: Your unit can immediately make a Normal move.RESTRICTIONS: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge and that unit cannot embark within a TRANSPORT at the end of this move.
stratagems.when: End of your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI unit from your army (excluding AIRCRAFT).
stratagems.effect: Your unit can immediately make a Normal move.RESTRICTIONS: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge and that unit cannot embark within a TRANSPORT at the end of this move.

stratagems.name: MURDERER’S CIRCUS
stratagems.legend: In bounding leaps and graceful pirouettes, the cavalcade of capricious killers bounds through hails of fire, cackling gleefully as they come.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: MALICIOUS FRENZY
stratagems.legend: Jealous competition descends into frenzied carnage as the kill count climbs higher and the intoxicating screams of the dying fill the air.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.TARGET: One DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.EFFECT: Select [LETHAL HITS] or [SUSTAINED HITS 1]. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Select [LETHAL HITS] or [SUSTAINED HITS 1]. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability.

stratagems.name: SCINTILLATING TEMPO
stratagems.legend: Commorrite or Harlequin, these lithe combatants move with stunning speed, darting in and out of firing lines before their foes can raise their weapons.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase, just after a DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army is selected to make a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, is set up on the battlefield, or declares a charge.TARGET: That unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the turn, enemy units cannot use the Fire Overwatch Stratagem to shoot at your unit.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase, just after a DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army is selected to make a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, is set up on the battlefield, or declares a charge.
stratagems.target: That unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, enemy units cannot use the Fire Overwatch Stratagem to shoot at your unit.

stratagems.name: SHORTEN THE ODDS
stratagems.legend: Having selected their victims, these killers strive to complete the kill with speed and brutality whilst moving ever closer to winning their macabre wager.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase, just after a DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army has Advanced.TARGET: That unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after a DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army has Advanced.
stratagems.target: That unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

stratagems.name: DANCE MACABRE
stratagems.legend: The saedath’s victims become unwitting partners in a frantic dance of ghastly slaughter.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.TARGET: One DRUKHARI INFANTRY or HARLEQUINS INFANTRY unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.EFFECT: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6". If your unit is currently losing the wager, it can make a Normal move of up to 6" instead.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI INFANTRY or HARLEQUINS INFANTRY unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6". If your unit is currently losing the wager, it can make a Normal move of up to 6" instead.

stratagems.name: FATEFUL ROLE
stratagems.legend: These warriors are so absorbed by their desire to win the wager that they risk death to land their killing blows.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if that unit is losing the wager: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if that unit is losing the wager: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.name: HYPERAGILITY
stratagems.legend: Driven by combat drugs and the elation of their victims'fear and pain, the Wyches weave around their enemies' blades with easy scorn.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One WYCH CULT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
stratagems.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One WYCH CULT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: TOYING WITH THE PREY
stratagems.legend: More than simply besting their victims in combat, the Wyches slowly take them apart, one perfectly placed cut and slice at a time, making a terrifying example to shatter enemy morale.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after a WYCH CULT unit from your army has fought.TARGET: That WYCH CULT unit.EFFECT: If your unit destroyed one or more enemy models this phase, select one of those enemy models. Until the end of your opponent’s next turn, subtract 1 from the Objective Control characteristic of models in that enemy model's unit (to a minimum of l).
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after a WYCH CULT unit from your army has fought.
stratagems.target: That WYCH CULT unit.
stratagems.effect: If your unit destroyed one or more enemy models this phase, select one of those enemy models. Until the end of your opponent’s next turn, subtract 1 from the Objective Control characteristic of models in that enemy model's unit (to a minimum of l).

stratagems.name: NO OBSTACLE
stratagems.legend: Scenting their prey's fear sweat, tracking their fluttering heartbeats, the Wyches beardown unerringly on their victims through corridors and chambers.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Charge phase.TARGET: One WYCH CULT unit from your army that opened a Hatchway this turn.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit can declare a charge that includes one or more targets that are not visible to it, provided each of those units that are not visible to it are wholly on the opposite side of that Hatchway from your unit.
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One WYCH CULT unit from your army that opened a Hatchway this turn.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit can declare a charge that includes one or more targets that are not visible to it, provided each of those units that are not visible to it are wholly on the opposite side of that Hatchway from your unit.

stratagems.name: PHANTASM GRENADES
stratagems.legend: These hallucinogenic atomisers spew clouds of nightmare-inducing gasses that leave the foe glassy-eyed and reeling.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase, just after a WYCH CULT unit from your army ends a Normal move, before any enemy units fire Overwatch.TARGET: That WYCH CULT unit.EFFECT: Select one enemy unit within 9" of and visible to your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result: if failed, until the end of the turn, that enemy unit cannot fire Overwatch.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after a WYCH CULT unit from your army ends a Normal move, before any enemy units fire Overwatch.
stratagems.target: That WYCH CULT unit.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit within 9" of and visible to your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result: if failed, until the end of the turn, that enemy unit cannot fire Overwatch.

stratagems.name: SKYBORNE ANNIHILATION
stratagems.legend: These warriors are well versed in raining suppressing fire on the foe even as they close with them from on high, shredding defences and leaving the survivors easy prey for the raid.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One DRUKHARI unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, or the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead if it is a KABALITE WARRIORS unit.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, or the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead if it is a KABALITE WARRIORS unit.

stratagems.name: VICIOUS BLADES
stratagems.legend: Wielding a horrifying array of hooked boarding blades, barbed lariats and other specialised tools of agony, these warriors hack and slash at their foes even as their transport skims low overhead.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after a DRUKHARI TRANSPORT from your army has selected its targets.TARGET: That TRANSPORT.EFFECT: After your TRANSPORT has fought, select one enemy unit that was the target of one or more of those attacks and roll one D6 for each model embarked within your TRANSPORT, adding 1 to the result if that embarked model is a WRACKS model: for each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after a DRUKHARI TRANSPORT from your army has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: That TRANSPORT.
stratagems.effect: After your TRANSPORT has fought, select one enemy unit that was the target of one or more of those attacks and roll one D6 for each model embarked within your TRANSPORT, adding 1 to the result if that embarked model is a WRACKS model: for each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

stratagems.name: WRAITHLIKE RETREAT
stratagems.legend: Employing smoke grenades, paralysing mists or simple cunning and agility, these warriors slip away like spectres.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: End of the Fight phase.TARGET: One DRUKHARI INFANTRY unit from your army that fought this phase.EFFECT: Your unit can make a Normal or Fall Back move, but unless it is a WYCHES unit, it must end that move wholly within 3" horizontally and 5" vertically of a friendly DRUKHARI TRANSPORT and must embark within that TRANSPORT at the end of that move.
stratagems.when: End of the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI INFANTRY unit from your army that fought this phase.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal or Fall Back move, but unless it is a WYCHES unit, it must end that move wholly within 3" horizontally and 5" vertically of a friendly DRUKHARI TRANSPORT and must embark within that TRANSPORT at the end of that move.

stratagems.name: POUNCE ON THE PREY
stratagems.legend: Incredible alien agility and a delight in taking wild risks help these warriors to leap acrobatically from their skimming transports directly into battle.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase, just after a DRUKHARI INFANTRY unit from your army disembarks from a TRANSPORT that made a Normal move this phase.TARGET: That INFANTRY unit. EFFECT: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after a DRUKHARI INFANTRY unit from your army disembarks from a TRANSPORT that made a Normal move this phase.
stratagems.target: That INFANTRY unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge.

stratagems.name: SWOOPING MOCKERY
stratagems.legend: The crew of this skimmer delight in evading and taunting their enemies with mocking ease.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.TARGET: One DRUKHARI TRANSPORT from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move.EFFECT: Your TRANSPORT can make a Normal move of up to 6".
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI TRANSPORT from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move.
stratagems.effect: Your TRANSPORT can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.name: NIGHT SHIELD
stratagems.legend: These powerful Drukhari devices occlude their raiding vehicles not only from physical sight but also targeting sensors and even psychic senses.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One DRUKHARI VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit has a 4+ invulnerable save.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has a 4+ invulnerable save.

stratagems.name: CREW-THIEVES
stratagems.type: Space Lane Raiders – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The fast-acting incapacitation toxins on the blades of these Wracks allow them to lay low the defenders, before dragging them away, alive but powerless, to a far more horrible fate than death.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One WRACKS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ANTI-INFANTRY 3+] ability.
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One WRACKS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ANTI-INFANTRY 3+] ability.

stratagems.name: SHIPBOARD SHADES
stratagems.type: Space Lane Raiders – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Amidst the strobing lumens and gouting steam of voidship combat, the Drukhari flicker and flit like malevolent, half-seen shadows.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One DRUKHARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: VOIDSHIP GLADIATORS
stratagems.type: Space Lane Raiders – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Treating the vessel they have boarded as just another arena to perform in, these Wyches turn every iota of their skill and agility to the task.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One WYCHES unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.EFFECT: Roll one D6: on a 2+, until the end of the turn, enemy units cannot fire Overwatch at your unit.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One WYCHES unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: Roll one D6: on a 2+, until the end of the turn, enemy units cannot fire Overwatch at your unit.

stratagems.name: VETERAN PIRATES
stratagems.type: Space Lane Raiders – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: No strangers to shipboard warfare, these warriors are skilled in loosing volleys then vanishing swiftly back behind corners and bulkheads to avoid reprisals.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase, just after a KABALITE WARRIORS unit from your army has shot.TARGET: That KABALITE WARRIORS unit.EFFECT: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 3".
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase, just after a KABALITE WARRIORS unit from your army has shot.
stratagems.target: That KABALITE WARRIORS unit.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 3".

stratagems.name: DECKPLATE SWEEPERS
stratagems.legend: Indiscriminate hails of splinter fire fill chambers and corridors, leaving nowhere to hide in the enclosed space.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One KABAL unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of splinter cannons, splinter rifles and splinter pistols equipped by models in your unit by 1.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One KABAL unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of splinter cannons, splinter rifles and splinter pistols equipped by models in your unit by 1.

stratagems.name: ELUSIVE DUELLISTS
stratagems.legend: These warriors delight in the close-quarters blade-duels of boarding actions, weaving around their enemies' blows and cutting them down in droves.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One DRUKHARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and, if your unit has the INCUBI keyword, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and, if your unit has the INCUBI keyword, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

stratagems.name: OPPORTUNISTIC THIEVES
stratagems.legend: Any undefended source of riches or power is fair game to these fast-moving raiders.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: End of your Fight phase.TARGET: One KABAL unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.EFFECT: Select one objective marker you do not control that is visible to your unit. Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", but if it does, every model in that unit must end that move as close as possible to that objective marker.
stratagems.when: End of your Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One KABAL unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
stratagems.effect: Select one objective marker you do not control that is visible to your unit. Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", but if it does, every model in that unit must end that move as close as possible to that objective marker.

stratagems.name: TAKE THEM ALIVE
stratagems.legend: Aiming to maim rather than slag, and employing psychotropic or paralysing venoms, the Kabalites seek to incapacitate their victims so that they too may be taken as plunder.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase, just after a KABAL unit from your army has shot.TARGET: That KABAL unit.EFFECT: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of your unit’s attacks this phase (excluding those made with Pistols). That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result if your unit is within 6” of it.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase, just after a KABAL unit from your army has shot.
stratagems.target: That KABAL unit.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of your unit’s attacks this phase (excluding those made with Pistols). That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result if your unit is within 6” of it.

abilities.name: Raid and Pillage
abilities.legend: These warriors reap a bounty of both material plunder and precious pain during their raids, leaving only shattered storage reliquaries and the twisted bodies of tortured victims in their wake.
abilities.rawDescription: Each time a DRUKHARI unit from your army destroys an enemy unit, if that enemy unit was within range of an objective marker controlled by your opponent at the start of the phase, you gain 1 Pain token. In addition, in your Command phase, you can select one objective marker you control that has one or more KABAL units from your army within range of it, then expend 1 Pain token from your Pain token pool. If you do, that objective marker is Secured by your army.
abilities.formattedDescription: Each time a DRUKHARI unit from your army destroys an enemy unit, if that enemy unit was within range of an objective marker controlled by your opponent at the start of the phase, you gain 1 Pain token. In addition, in your Command phase, you can select one objective marker you control that has one or more KABAL units from your army within range of it, then expend 1 Pain token from your Pain token pool. If you do, that objective marker is Secured by your army.

stratagems.name: MOULDED MUSCULATURE
stratagems.legend: The muscular fleshcraft monstrosities fielded by the Haemonculi can punch through hatchways and bulkheads to reach their cowering victims.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Select any number of models in your unit. Until the end of the phase, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of melee weapons equipped by the selected models by 1, and each time you select targets for attacks made by those models, they must target an enemy unit that is wholly on the opposite side of a Hatchway from them.
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Select any number of models in your unit. Until the end of the phase, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of melee weapons equipped by the selected models by 1, and each time you select targets for attacks made by those models, they must target an enemy unit that is wholly on the opposite side of a Hatchway from them.

stratagems.name: UNFEELING ABOMINATIONS
stratagems.legend: The creations of the Haemonculi are capable of enduring terrible wounds and continuing to fight.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 if your unit has the GROTESQUES keyword: on a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.RESTRICTIONS: If your unit has the GROTESQUES keyword, until the end of the phase, it loses the Mindless Killing Machines ability.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 if your unit has the GROTESQUES keyword: on a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.RESTRICTIONS: If your unit has the GROTESQUES keyword, until the end of the phase, it loses the Mindless Killing Machines ability.

stratagems.name: TERRIFYING AURA
stratagems.legend: The disturbing nature of these creatures causes weapons to quiver, even in the hands of veteran soldiers.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks and is within 6" of the attacking unit.EFFECT: That enemy unit must take a Leadership test, subtracting 1 if it is within 3" of your unit: if failed, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack that targets your unit, an unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit, irrespective of the attacking weapon’s Ballistic Skill or any modifiers.
stratagems.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks and is within 6" of the attacking unit.
stratagems.effect: That enemy unit must take a Leadership test, subtracting 1 if it is within 3" of your unit: if failed, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack that targets your unit, an unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit, irrespective of the attacking weapon’s Ballistic Skill or any modifiers.

stratagems.name: HORRIFYING FORM
stratagems.legend: The hulking monsters of the Haemonculus Covens are terrifying indeed, cowing enemy warriors with their grotesque and intimidating forms.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: End of any phase, when an objective marker Secured by your army would be Seized by an enemy unit.TARGET: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army within range of that objective marker.EFFECT: Until the end of your next turn, while you have one or more DRUKHARI units within range of that objective marker (excluding Battle-shocked units), that objective marker remains Secured by your army and cannot be Seized by enemy units.RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle round.
stratagems.when: End of any phase, when an objective marker Secured by your army would be Seized by an enemy unit.
stratagems.target: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army within range of that objective marker.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of your next turn, while you have one or more DRUKHARI units within range of that objective marker (excluding Battle-shocked units), that objective marker remains Secured by your army and cannot be Seized by enemy units.RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle round.

abilities.name: Regenerative Agony
abilities.legend: The twisted physiologies of the Haemonculus fleshcrafters’ creations are inured to all but the most terrible injuries. The greater and more terrible the agonies inflicted upon their hideous forms, the more formidable their regenerative abilities become.
abilities.rawDescription: Each time four or more Feel No Pain rolls are successful for HAEMONCULUS COVENS models from your army in a single phase, you gain 1 Pain token. In addition, each battle round, the first time a HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army becomes Empowered in that battle round, roll one D6: on a 2-5, one model in that unit regains 1 lost wound or, if that unit has the WRACKS keyword, one destroyed model is returned to it with its full wounds remaining; on a 6, one model in that unit regains up to 2 lost wounds or, if that unit has the WRACKS keyword, one destroyed model is returned to it with its full wounds remaining.
abilities.formattedDescription: Each time four or more Feel No Pain rolls are successful for HAEMONCULUS COVENS models from your army in a single phase, you gain 1 Pain token. In addition, each battle round, the first time a HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army becomes Empowered in that battle round, roll one D6: on a 2-5, one model in that unit regains 1 lost wound or, if that unit has the WRACKS keyword, one destroyed model is returned to it with its full wounds remaining; on a 6, one model in that unit regains up to 2 lost wounds or, if that unit has the WRACKS keyword, one destroyed model is returned to it with its full wounds remaining.

stratagems.name: ALLIANCE OF AGONY
stratagems.legend: Even the most bloodthirsty Drukhari will veil their enmity to work together against a shared enemy for the same gruesome purpose.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Start of any phase.TARGET: One ARCHON, one SUCCUBUS and one HAEMONCULUS from your army.EFFECT: Discard one Pain token from your Pain token pool. Until the end of the phase, all three of those models’ units are Empowered.RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem if you are able to select all three of the target models stated above.
stratagems.when: Start of any phase.
stratagems.target: One ARCHON, one SUCCUBUS and one HAEMONCULUS from your army.
stratagems.effect: Discard one Pain token from your Pain token pool. Until the end of the phase, all three of those models’ units are Empowered.RESTRICTIONS: You can only use this Stratagem if you are able to select all three of the target models stated above.

stratagems.name: QUICKSILVER REACTIONS
stratagems.legend: The hyper-fast reflexes of the Drukhari allow them to duck and weave to avoid all but the swiftest enemy strikes.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One DRUKHARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack that targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.RESTRICTIONS: You cannot target a HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army for this Stratagem.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack that targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.RESTRICTIONS: You cannot target a HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army for this Stratagem.

stratagems.name: INSENSIBLE TO PAIN
stratagems.legend: The twisted creations of the Haemonculus Covens are insensible to all but the most mortal injuries.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: PREY ON THE WEAK
stratagems.legend: The scent of a foe in pain draws Drukhari to it like hungry predators to an injured beast, their senses sharpening at its tang.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One KABAL unit from your army and one enemy unit that is Below Half-strength.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One KABAL unit from your army and one enemy unit that is Below Half-strength.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: ACROBATIC DISPLAY
stratagems.legend: Many Wych Cults favour spectacular gymnastic displays. Their fighters are never still, springing from one foot to the other at blinding speed.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Charge phase.TARGET: One WYCH CULT unit from your army.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge even if it Fell Back or Advanced this turn.
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One WYCH CULT unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge even if it Fell Back or Advanced this turn.

stratagems.name: STRIKE AND FADE
stratagems.legend: The Drukhari are masters at using hit-and-run tactics, engaging a target with a flurry of shots before quickly manoeuvring into cover or out of sight.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: End of your Shooting phase.TARGET: One DRUKHARI unit from your army (excluding AIRCRAFT).EFFECT: Your unit can immediately make a Normal move.RESTRICTIONS: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge and that unit cannot embark within a TRANSPORT at the end of this move.
stratagems.when: End of your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI unit from your army (excluding AIRCRAFT).
stratagems.effect: Your unit can immediately make a Normal move.RESTRICTIONS: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge and that unit cannot embark within a TRANSPORT at the end of this move.

abilities.name: Realspace Raiders
abilities.legend: The three factions of the Drukhari are constantly vying for supremacy, each convinced beyond doubt of their own innate superiority. This struggle manifests during their realspace raids as a frenzy of murderously sadistic competition.
abilities.rawDescription: At the start of the battle, you gain an additional 1 Pain token for each of the following your army contains:One or more ARCHON modelsOne or more SUCCUBUS modelsOne or more HAEMONCULUS modelsDesigner’s Note: These are all cumulative, so if your army contains at least one Archon, at least one Succubus and at least one Haemonculus, you would start the battle with an additional 3 Pain tokens.
abilities.formattedDescription: At the start of the battle, you gain an additional 1 Pain token for each of the following your army contains:One or more ARCHON modelsOne or more SUCCUBUS modelsOne or more HAEMONCULUS modelsDesigner’s Note: These are all cumulative, so if your army contains at least one Archon, at least one Succubus and at least one Haemonculus, you would start the battle with an additional 3 Pain tokens.

stratagems.name: MURDERER’S CIRCUS
stratagems.legend: In bounding leaps and graceful pirouettes, the cavalcade of capricious killers bounds through hails of fire, cackling gleefully as they come.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: MALICIOUS FRENZY
stratagems.legend: Jealous competition descends into frenzied carnage as the kill count climbs higher and the intoxicating screams of the dying fill the air.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.TARGET: One DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.EFFECT: Select [LETHAL HITS] or [SUSTAINED HITS 1]. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Select [LETHAL HITS] or [SUSTAINED HITS 1]. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability.

stratagems.name: SCINTILLATING TEMPO
stratagems.legend: Commorrite or Harlequin, these lithe combatants move with stunning speed, darting in and out of firing lines before their foes can raise their weapons.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase, just after a DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army is selected to make a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, is set up on the battlefield, or declares a charge.TARGET: That unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the turn, enemy units cannot use the Fire Overwatch Stratagem to shoot at your unit.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase, just after a DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army is selected to make a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, is set up on the battlefield, or declares a charge.
stratagems.target: That unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, enemy units cannot use the Fire Overwatch Stratagem to shoot at your unit.

stratagems.name: SHORTEN THE ODDS
stratagems.legend: Having selected their victims, these killers strive to complete the kill with speed and brutality whilst moving ever closer to winning their macabre wager.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase, just after a DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army has Advanced.TARGET: That unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after a DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army has Advanced.
stratagems.target: That unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

stratagems.name: DANCE MACABRE
stratagems.legend: The saedath’s victims become unwitting partners in a frantic dance of ghastly slaughter.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.TARGET: One DRUKHARI INFANTRY or HARLEQUINS INFANTRY unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.EFFECT: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6". If your unit is currently losing the wager, it can make a Normal move of up to 6" instead.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI INFANTRY or HARLEQUINS INFANTRY unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6". If your unit is currently losing the wager, it can make a Normal move of up to 6" instead.

stratagems.name: FATEFUL ROLE
stratagems.legend: These warriors are so absorbed by their desire to win the wager that they risk death to land their killing blows.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if that unit is losing the wager: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if that unit is losing the wager: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

abilities.name: Callous Competition
abilities.legend: In this saedath, the Harlequins embody the Reaper, whilst their Drukhari companions are mortal killers.
abilities.rawDescription: At the start of the battle, DRUKHARI units from your army are winning the wager.Each time a DRUKHARI unit from your army destroys an enemy unit, DRUKHARI units from your army are winning the wager.Each time a HARLEQUINS unit from your army destroys an enemy unit, HARLEQUIN units from your army are winning the wager.While DRUKHARI units from your army are winning the wager, HARLEQUIN units from your army are losing the wager, and vice versa.Each time a DRUKHARI or HARLEQUINS model from your army makes an attack, if that model’s unit is losing the wager, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1.HARLEQUINSYou can include HARLEQUINS units in your army (see Index: Aeldari). The combined points cost of such units depends on your battle size:Incursion: Up to 500 ptsStrike Force: Up to 1000 ptsOnslaught: Up to 1500 ptsNo HARLEQUINS models from your army can be your WARLORD.

stratagems.name: HYPERAGILITY
stratagems.legend: Driven by combat drugs and the elation of their victims'fear and pain, the Wyches weave around their enemies' blades with easy scorn.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One WYCH CULT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
stratagems.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One WYCH CULT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: TOYING WITH THE PREY
stratagems.legend: More than simply besting their victims in combat, the Wyches slowly take them apart, one perfectly placed cut and slice at a time, making a terrifying example to shatter enemy morale.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after a WYCH CULT unit from your army has fought.TARGET: That WYCH CULT unit.EFFECT: If your unit destroyed one or more enemy models this phase, select one of those enemy models. Until the end of your opponent’s next turn, subtract 1 from the Objective Control characteristic of models in that enemy model's unit (to a minimum of l).
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after a WYCH CULT unit from your army has fought.
stratagems.target: That WYCH CULT unit.
stratagems.effect: If your unit destroyed one or more enemy models this phase, select one of those enemy models. Until the end of your opponent’s next turn, subtract 1 from the Objective Control characteristic of models in that enemy model's unit (to a minimum of l).

stratagems.name: NO OBSTACLE
stratagems.legend: Scenting their prey's fear sweat, tracking their fluttering heartbeats, the Wyches beardown unerringly on their victims through corridors and chambers.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Charge phase.TARGET: One WYCH CULT unit from your army that opened a Hatchway this turn.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit can declare a charge that includes one or more targets that are not visible to it, provided each of those units that are not visible to it are wholly on the opposite side of that Hatchway from your unit.
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One WYCH CULT unit from your army that opened a Hatchway this turn.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit can declare a charge that includes one or more targets that are not visible to it, provided each of those units that are not visible to it are wholly on the opposite side of that Hatchway from your unit.

stratagems.name: PHANTASM GRENADES
stratagems.legend: These hallucinogenic atomisers spew clouds of nightmare-inducing gasses that leave the foe glassy-eyed and reeling.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase, just after a WYCH CULT unit from your army ends a Normal move, before any enemy units fire Overwatch.TARGET: That WYCH CULT unit.EFFECT: Select one enemy unit within 9" of and visible to your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result: if failed, until the end of the turn, that enemy unit cannot fire Overwatch.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after a WYCH CULT unit from your army ends a Normal move, before any enemy units fire Overwatch.
stratagems.target: That WYCH CULT unit.
stratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit within 9" of and visible to your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result: if failed, until the end of the turn, that enemy unit cannot fire Overwatch.

abilities.name: Appetite for Adulation
abilities.legend: Thriving upon the praise their sadistic deeds will earn from their twisted audience, the Wyches fight all the harder and inflict ever-more excessive torments upon their victims.
abilities.rawDescription: In the Fight phase, if two or more enemy units were destroyed by DRUKHARI units from your army that phase, you gain 1 Pain token. In addition, each time a WYCH CULT unit from your army becomes Empowered in the Fight phase, until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [ANTi-iNFANTRY 4+] ability.
abilities.formattedDescription: In the Fight phase, if two or more enemy units were destroyed by DRUKHARI units from your army that phase, you gain 1 Pain token. In addition, each time a WYCH CULT unit from your army becomes Empowered in the Fight phase, until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [ANTi-iNFANTRY 4+] ability.

stratagems.name: SKYBORNE ANNIHILATION
stratagems.legend: These warriors are well versed in raining suppressing fire on the foe even as they close with them from on high, shredding defences and leaving the survivors easy prey for the raid.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One DRUKHARI unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, or the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead if it is a KABALITE WARRIORS unit.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, or the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead if it is a KABALITE WARRIORS unit.

stratagems.name: VICIOUS BLADES
stratagems.legend: Wielding a horrifying array of hooked boarding blades, barbed lariats and other specialised tools of agony, these warriors hack and slash at their foes even as their transport skims low overhead.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after a DRUKHARI TRANSPORT from your army has selected its targets.TARGET: That TRANSPORT.EFFECT: After your TRANSPORT has fought, select one enemy unit that was the target of one or more of those attacks and roll one D6 for each model embarked within your TRANSPORT, adding 1 to the result if that embarked model is a WRACKS model: for each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after a DRUKHARI TRANSPORT from your army has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: That TRANSPORT.
stratagems.effect: After your TRANSPORT has fought, select one enemy unit that was the target of one or more of those attacks and roll one D6 for each model embarked within your TRANSPORT, adding 1 to the result if that embarked model is a WRACKS model: for each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

stratagems.name: WRAITHLIKE RETREAT
stratagems.legend: Employing smoke grenades, paralysing mists or simple cunning and agility, these warriors slip away like spectres.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: End of the Fight phase.TARGET: One DRUKHARI INFANTRY unit from your army that fought this phase.EFFECT: Your unit can make a Normal or Fall Back move, but unless it is a WYCHES unit, it must end that move wholly within 3" horizontally and 5" vertically of a friendly DRUKHARI TRANSPORT and must embark within that TRANSPORT at the end of that move.
stratagems.when: End of the Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI INFANTRY unit from your army that fought this phase.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal or Fall Back move, but unless it is a WYCHES unit, it must end that move wholly within 3" horizontally and 5" vertically of a friendly DRUKHARI TRANSPORT and must embark within that TRANSPORT at the end of that move.

stratagems.name: POUNCE ON THE PREY
stratagems.legend: Incredible alien agility and a delight in taking wild risks help these warriors to leap acrobatically from their skimming transports directly into battle.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase, just after a DRUKHARI INFANTRY unit from your army disembarks from a TRANSPORT that made a Normal move this phase.TARGET: That INFANTRY unit. EFFECT: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after a DRUKHARI INFANTRY unit from your army disembarks from a TRANSPORT that made a Normal move this phase.
stratagems.target: That INFANTRY unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge.

stratagems.name: SWOOPING MOCKERY
stratagems.legend: The crew of this skimmer delight in evading and taunting their enemies with mocking ease.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.TARGET: One DRUKHARI TRANSPORT from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move.EFFECT: Your TRANSPORT can make a Normal move of up to 6".
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI TRANSPORT from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move.
stratagems.effect: Your TRANSPORT can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.name: NIGHT SHIELD
stratagems.legend: These powerful Drukhari devices occlude their raiding vehicles not only from physical sight but also targeting sensors and even psychic senses.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One DRUKHARI VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, your unit has a 4+ invulnerable save.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has a 4+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Rain Of Cruelty
abilities.legend: Few warriors in the galaxy are as adept at launching punishing skyborne raids as the Drukhari. Before their prey even realise the peril, the killers of Commorragh are amongst their lines like grinning ghouls. Splinter fire lays low defenders still scrambling into position.  Quicksilver assaults leave dozens screaming in maimed agony. Often, the battle is over before it has even truly begun.
abilities.rawDescription: Each time a DRUKHARI unit from your army disembarks from a TRANSPORT, until the end of the turn, that unit’s ranged weapons have the [IGNORES COVER] ability and that unit’s melee weapons have the [LANCE] ability.
abilities.formattedDescription: Each time a DRUKHARI unit from your army disembarks from a TRANSPORT, until the end of the turn, that unit’s ranged weapons have the [IGNORES COVER] ability and that unit’s melee weapons have the [LANCE] ability.

stratagems.name: CREW-THIEVES
stratagems.type: Space Lane Raiders – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The fast-acting incapacitation toxins on the blades of these Wracks allow them to lay low the defenders, before dragging them away, alive but powerless, to a far more horrible fate than death.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase.TARGET: One WRACKS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ANTI-INFANTRY 3+] ability.
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One WRACKS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ANTI-INFANTRY 3+] ability.

stratagems.name: SHIPBOARD SHADES
stratagems.type: Space Lane Raiders – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Amidst the strobing lumens and gouting steam of voidship combat, the Drukhari flicker and flit like malevolent, half-seen shadows.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One DRUKHARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: VOIDSHIP GLADIATORS
stratagems.type: Space Lane Raiders – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Treating the vessel they have boarded as just another arena to perform in, these Wyches turn every iota of their skill and agility to the task.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase.TARGET: One WYCHES unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.EFFECT: Roll one D6: on a 2+, until the end of the turn, enemy units cannot fire Overwatch at your unit.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One WYCHES unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
stratagems.effect: Roll one D6: on a 2+, until the end of the turn, enemy units cannot fire Overwatch at your unit.

stratagems.name: VETERAN PIRATES
stratagems.type: Space Lane Raiders – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: No strangers to shipboard warfare, these warriors are skilled in loosing volleys then vanishing swiftly back behind corners and bulkheads to avoid reprisals.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase, just after a KABALITE WARRIORS unit from your army has shot.TARGET: That KABALITE WARRIORS unit.EFFECT: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 3".
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase, just after a KABALITE WARRIORS unit from your army has shot.
stratagems.target: That KABALITE WARRIORS unit.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 3".

abilities.name: Commorrite Rivalries
abilities.legend: Even in the midst of battle, the Drukhari indulge in politicking and factionalism, seeking to outdo their rivals and cover themselves in dark glory with every murderous triumph.
abilities.rawDescription: Each time a DRUKHARI CHARACTER model from your army destroys an enemy CHARACTER unit, you gain 1 Pain token. In addition, each time you use the Battlefield Command Stratagem, you can expend 1 Pain token from your Pain token pool. If you do, decrease that Stratagems cost by 1CP for that usage.
abilities.formattedDescription: Each time a DRUKHARI CHARACTER model from your army destroys an enemy CHARACTER unit, you gain 1 Pain token. In addition, each time you use the Battlefield Command Stratagem, you can expend 1 Pain token from your Pain token pool. If you do, decrease that Stratagems cost by 1CP for that usage.

detachmentAbilities.name: Realspace Raiders
detachmentAbilities.legend: The three factions of the Drukhari are constantly vying for supremacy, each convinced beyond doubt of their own innate superiority. This struggle manifests during their realspace raids as a frenzy of murderously sadistic competition.
detachmentAbilities.rawDescription: At the start of the battle, you gain an additional 1 Pain token for each of the following your army contains:One or more ARCHON modelsOne or more SUCCUBUS modelsOne or more HAEMONCULUS modelsDesigner’s Note: These are all cumulative, so if your army contains at least one Archon, at least one Succubus and at least one Haemonculus, you would start the battle with an additional 3 Pain tokens.

detachmentAbilities.name: Raid and Pillage
detachmentAbilities.legend: These warriors reap a bounty of both material plunder and precious pain during their raids, leaving only shattered storage reliquaries and the twisted bodies of tortured victims in their wake.
detachmentAbilities.rawDescription: Each time a DRUKHARI unit from your army destroys an enemy unit, if that enemy unit was within range of an objective marker controlled by your opponent at the start of the phase, you gain 1 Pain token. In addition, in your Command phase, you can select one objective marker you control that has one or more KABAL units from your army within range of it, then expend 1 Pain token from your Pain token pool. If you do, that objective marker is Secured by your army.
detachmentAbilities.formattedDescription: Each time a DRUKHARI unit from your army destroys an enemy unit, if that enemy unit was within range of an objective marker controlled by your opponent at the start of the phase, you gain 1 Pain token. In addition, in your Command phase, you can select one objective marker you control that has one or more KABAL units from your army within range of it, then expend 1 Pain token from your Pain token pool. If you do, that objective marker is Secured by your army.

detachmentAbilities.name: Regenerative Agony
detachmentAbilities.legend: The twisted physiologies of the Haemonculus fleshcrafters’ creations are inured to all but the most terrible injuries. The greater and more terrible the agonies inflicted upon their hideous forms, the more formidable their regenerative abilities become.
detachmentAbilities.rawDescription: Each time four or more Feel No Pain rolls are successful for HAEMONCULUS COVENS models from your army in a single phase, you gain 1 Pain token. In addition, each battle round, the first time a HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army becomes Empowered in that battle round, roll one D6: on a 2-5, one model in that unit regains 1 lost wound or, if that unit has the WRACKS keyword, one destroyed model is returned to it with its full wounds remaining; on a 6, one model in that unit regains up to 2 lost wounds or, if that unit has the WRACKS keyword, one destroyed model is returned to it with its full wounds remaining.

In addition, each battle round, the first time a HAEMONCULUS COVENS unit from your army becomes Empowered in that battle round, roll one D6: on a 2-5, one model in that unit regains 1 lost wound or, if that unit has the WRACKS keyword, one destroyed model is returned to it with its full wounds remaining; on a 6, one model in that unit regains up to 2 lost wounds or, if that unit has the WRACKS keyword, one destroyed model is returned to it with its full wounds remaining.
